titleStmt.title: The court of conscience or Dick VVhippers sessions VVith the order of his arraigning and punishing of many notorious, dissembling, wicked, and vitious liuers in this age. By Richard West.
Court of conscience.
titleStmt.author: West, Richard, fl. 1606-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: By G. Eld, for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop adioyning to Christ Church gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop adioyning to Christ Church gate
